definitions.definition: Having a crust , especially a thick one.
Short-tempered and gruff but, sometimes, with a harmless or benign inner nature.
definitions.label_groups: informal , figuratively , of a person or behavior

definitions.definition: Of very low quality; crude visuals or harsh, granular sound. (Can we add an example for this sense?)

main_definition: Having a crust , especially a thick one.
secondary_definitions: ( informal , figuratively , of a person or behavior ) Short-tempered and gruff but, sometimes, with a harmless or benign inner nature.
( informal ) Of very low quality; crude visuals or harsh, granular sound. (Can we add an example for this sense?)
